Class Form

  • java.lang.Object
    • Form
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipointForm, SimpleForm

    public abstract class Form
extends java.lang.Object
    A Form is a form with one point. A Form manages the settings of every form. A Form draws itself.
    Author:
    Philippe Krüttli
